name: Priest of RAGE
description: This is a Compo Mode submission for Ludum Dare #45. Theme - Start with nothing. I decided to take it in a player has nothing direction. So in this game you start with nothing. No menus, controls, graphics, sounds. Nothing. Slowly you must purchase each piece of the game. Gameplay is a rage platformer focused on tight control. Currently has 3 levels. Play as a Bad-ass priest set on quenching the fires of hell by acquiring the only artifact with that power! Escape the wall of flames that is destroying everything it touches.
